refnamediv.refpurpose: indicates the CSS stylesheet to use to format HTML output

refsect1.title: Applies To
refsect1.para: This parameter applies to only the HTML output format.

refsect1.title: Possible Values
refsect1.para: The value of css.href is a URL that points to a Cascading Style Sheet file. The HTML version of the &resume; will link to this file.
For information on the CSS classes that are available for formatting, see .
